<meta name="referrer" content="always" />
<meta name="description" content="《人民的名义》是最高人民检察院影视中心、金盾影视中心出品，由李路执导、周梅森编剧、李学政等担任总监制，陆毅、张丰毅、吴刚、许亚军、张志坚、柯蓝、胡静、张凯丽、赵子琪、白志迪、李建义、王丽云、高亚麟、丁海峰、冯雷、李光复、陶慧敏、张晞临等联袂主演，黄俊鹏、侯勇、许文广、徐光宇、沈晓海、侯天来、周浩东、黄品沅、刘伟、赵龙豪、李学政等特别出演的检察反腐电视剧。该剧以检察官侯亮平的调查行动为叙事主线，讲述了当代检察官维护公平正义和法制统一、查办贪腐案件的故事，于2017年3月28日在湖南卫视“金鹰独播剧场”播出，收视率突破8%，刷新了近十年省级卫视收视的最高纪录，同时入选2017中国十大事件。2017年4月27日，该剧在GMIC X 2017非凡盛典上获得&amp;quot;互联网时代最具影响力影视作品&amp;quot;奖；5月，《人民的名义》总监制李学政获得最具工匠精神发行奖和特别贡献奖和2017工匠中国年度十大人物。6月16日">
<title>人民的名义（2017年李路执导电视剧）_百度百科</title>

<meta property="og:description" content="《人民的名义》是最高人民检察院影视中心、金盾影视中心出品，由李路执导、周梅森编剧、李学政等担任总监制，陆毅、张丰毅、吴刚、许亚军、张志坚、柯蓝、胡静、张凯丽、赵子琪、白志迪、李建义、王丽云、高亚麟、丁海峰、冯雷、李光复、陶慧敏、张晞临等联袂主演，黄俊鹏、侯勇、许文广、徐光宇、沈晓海、侯天来、周浩东、黄品沅、刘伟、赵龙豪、李学政等特别出演的检察反腐电视剧。该剧以检察官侯亮平的调查行动为叙事主线，讲述了当代检察官维护公平正义和法制统一、查办贪腐案件的故事，于2017年3月28日在湖南卫视“金鹰独播剧场”播出，收视率突破8%，刷新了近十年省级卫视收视的最高纪录，同时入选2017中国十大事件。2017年4月27日，该剧在GMIC X 2017非凡盛典上获得&amp;quot;互联网时代最具影响力影视作品&amp;quot;奖；5月，《人民的名义》总监制李学政获得最具工匠精神发行奖和特别贡献奖和2017工匠中国年度十大人物。6月16日" />

<div><a href="/tashuo/browse/content?id=8ebf3bd36116a39085e0da29" target="_blank">繁星团</a></div>
<div><a href="/kedou/" target="_blank">蝌蚪团</a></div>
</dd>
</dl>
<dl class="cooperation ">
<dt>权威合作</dt>
<dd>
<div><a href="/operation/cooperation#joint" target="_blank">合作模式</a></div>

</dd>
</dl>

<div class="polysemant-list">
<div class="polysemantList-header">
<div class="polysemantList-header-title">
<b class="polysemant-list-lemma-title">人民的名义</b>是一个<a href="/item/%E7%99%BE%E5%BA%A6%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%EF%BC%9A%E5%A4%9A%E4%B9%89%E8%AF%8D" target="_blank">多义词</a>，请在下列<a href="/item/%E4%B9%89%E9%A1%B9" target="_blank">义项</a>上选择浏览（<a href="/item/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8D%E4%B9%89?force=1" class="J-polysemant-total" target="_blank">共5个义项</a>）<span class="polysemant-separator"></span>
<div class="toggle expand">
<a class="polysemant-button polysemant-button--expand" href="javascript:;">
<span class="polysemant-button__text J-polysemant-button__text">展开</span>
<em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_down-arrow polysemant-button__icon J-polysemant-button__icon"></em>
</a>
<a class="polysemant-button polysemant-button--collapse" href="javascript:;">
<span class="polysemant-button__text J-polysemant-button__text">收起</span>
<em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_up-arrow polysemant-button__icon J-polysemant-button__icon"></em>
</a>
</div>
<a class="polysemant-button polysemant-button--add J-polysemant-button--add" href="javascript:;" data-href="/editor/load/createload?lemmaTitle=%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8D%E4%B9%89&createSub=1">
<span class="polysemant-button__text J-polysemant-button__text">添加义项</span>

<dd class="lemmaWgt-lemmaTitle-title J-lemma-title">
<span >
<h1 >人民的名义</h1>
</span>
<span class="btn-list">
<a class="cmn-btn-28 cmn-btn-hover-blue audio-play title-audio-play J-title-audio-play" href="javascript:;"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_voice-play"></em><span class="J-audio-text">播报</span></a>
<a href="javascript:;" class="edit-lemma cmn-btn-hover-blue cmn-btn-28 j-edit-link" data-entry="lemma_pc"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_edit-lemma"></em>编辑</a>
<a class="lock-lemma cmn-btn-hover-blue" nslog-type="10003105" target="_self" href="javascript:;" title="锁定"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_lock-new"></em>锁定</a>
<a href="/planet/talk?lemmaId=17545218&fromModule=lemma_right-issue-btn" target="_blank" class="lemma-discussion cmn-btn-hover-blue cmn-btn-28 j-discussion-link" nslog-type="90000102"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_discussion-solid"></em>讨论<span class="num"></span></a>
<a href="javascript:;" class="add-video cmn-btn-hover-blue cmn-btn-28 J-add-video-link J-add-video">

</span>
</dd>

<div style="width:0;height:0;clear:both"></div></dd>
<dt class="title">
</dt>
<dd class="authority desc">
</dd>
<dd class="desc">
<div class="lemma-summary J-summary" label-module="lemmaSummary">
<div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13j7de4g" >《人民的名义》是<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%A3%80%E5%AF%9F%E9%99%A2%E5%BD%B1%E8%A7%86%E4%B8%AD%E5%BF%83/2250703" data-lemmaid="2250703">最高人民检察院影视中心</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%87%91%E7%9B%BE%E5%BD%B1%E8%A7%86%E4%B8%AD%E5%BF%83/52695877" data-lemmaid="52695877">金盾影视中心</a>出品，由<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E8%B7%AF/4847406" data-lemmaid="4847406">李路</a>执导、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%91%A8%E6%A2%85%E6%A3%AE/17080" data-lemmaid="17080">周梅森</a>编剧、李学政等担任总监制，<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%99%86%E6%AF%85/361763" data-lemmaid="361763">陆毅</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E4%B8%B0%E6%AF%85/2139258" data-lemmaid="2139258">张丰毅</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%90%B4%E5%88%9A/2234630" data-lemmaid="2234630">吴刚</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%AE%B8%E4%BA%9A%E5%86%9B/11048686" data-lemmaid="11048686">许亚军</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E5%BF%97%E5%9D%9A/3918860" data-lemmaid="3918860">张志坚</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9F%AF%E8%93%9D/17954" data-lemmaid="17954">柯蓝</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%83%A1%E9%9D%99/11413" data-lemmaid="11413">胡静</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E5%87%AF%E4%B8%BD/2273054" data-lemmaid="2273054">张凯丽</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%B5%B5%E5%AD%90%E7%90%AA/3020073" data-lemmaid="3020073">赵子琪</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E7%99%BD%E5%BF%97%E8%BF%AA/397692" data-lemmaid="397692">白志迪</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E5%BB%BA%E4%B9%89/64998" data-lemmaid="64998">李建义</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E7%8E%8B%E4%B8%BD%E4%BA%91/29863" data-lemmaid="29863">王丽云</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%9A%E9%BA%9F/7974326" data-lemmaid="7974326">高亚麟</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%B8%81%E6%B5%B7%E5%B3%B0/60634" data-lemmaid="60634">丁海峰</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%86%AF%E9%9B%B7/2616837" data-lemmaid="2616837">冯雷</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E5%85%89%E5%A4%8D/1723339" data-lemmaid="1723339">李光复</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%99%B6%E6%85%A7%E6%95%8F/991800" data-lemmaid="991800">陶慧敏</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E6%99%9E%E4%B8%B4/10573907" data-lemmaid="10573907">张晞临</a>等联袂主演，<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%BB%84%E4%BF%8A%E9%B9%8F/10057754" data-lemmaid="10057754">黄俊鹏</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%BE%AF%E5%8B%87/13412" data-lemmaid="13412">侯勇</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%AE%B8%E6%96%87%E5%B9%BF/14926" data-lemmaid="14926">许文广</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BE%90%E5%85%89%E5%AE%87/1544724" data-lemmaid="1544724">徐光宇</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%B2%88%E6%99%93%E6%B5%B7/81194" data-lemmaid="81194">沈晓海</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%BE%AF%E5%A4%A9%E6%9D%A5/8436414" data-lemmaid="8436414">侯天来</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%91%A8%E6%B5%A9%E4%B8%9C/7534308" data-lemmaid="7534308">周浩东</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%BB%84%E5%93%81%E6%B2%85/7658737" data-lemmaid="7658737">黄品沅</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%88%98%E4%BC%9F/10490737" data-lemmaid="10490737">刘伟</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%B5%B5%E9%BE%99%E8%B1%AA/20618285" data-lemmaid="20618285">赵龙豪</a>、李学政等特别出演的检察反腐电视剧。</div><div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13meyb1f" >该剧以检察官<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%BE%AF%E4%BA%AE%E5%B9%B3/20493743" data-lemmaid="20493743">侯亮平</a>的调查行动为叙事主线，讲述了当代检察官维护公平正义和法制统一、查办贪腐案件的故事，于2017年3月28日在<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%B9%96%E5%8D%97%E5%8D%AB%E8%A7%86/220836" data-lemmaid="220836">湖南卫视</a>“<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%87%91%E9%B9%B0%E7%8B%AC%E6%92%AD%E5%89%A7%E5%9C%BA/3760172" data-lemmaid="3760172">金鹰独播剧场</a>”播出<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="1" data-ctrmap=":1,">
[1]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_1_17626482" id="ref_1_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
，收视率突破8%，刷新了近十年省级卫视收视的最高纪录<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="2" data-ctrmap=":2,">
[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_2_17626482" id="ref_2_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
，同时入选2017中国十大事件<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="3" data-ctrmap=":3,">
[3]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_3_17626482" id="ref_3_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
。</div><div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13pkakct" >2017年4月27日，该剧在<a target=_blank href="/item/GMIC%20X%202017%E9%9D%9E%E5%87%A1%E7%9B%9B%E5%85%B8/20725554" data-lemmaid="20725554">GMIC X 2017非凡盛典</a>上获得"互联网时代最具影响力影视作品"奖<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="4" data-ctrmap=":4,">
[4]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_4_17626482" id="ref_4_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
；5月，《人民的名义》总监制李学政获得最具工匠精神发行奖和特别贡献奖和2017工匠中国年度十大人物<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="3" data-ctrmap=":5,:3,">
[3]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_3_17626482" id="ref_3_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="5" data-ctrmap=":5,:3,">
[5]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_5_17626482" id="ref_5_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
。6月16日，<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%90%B4%E5%88%9A/2234630" data-lemmaid="2234630">吴刚</a>和<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E5%BF%97%E5%9D%9A/3918860" data-lemmaid="3918860">张志坚</a>凭该剧荣获<a target=_blank href="/item/%E7%AC%AC23%E5%B1%8A%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E7%94%B5%E8%A7%86%E8%8A%82%E7%99%BD%E7%8E%89%E5%85%B0%E5%A5%96/20863455" data-lemmaid="20863455">第23届上海电视节白玉兰奖</a>最佳男配角奖<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="6" data-ctrmap=":6,">
[6]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_6_17626482" id="ref_6_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
。2018年3月26日，该剧入围<a target=_blank href="/item/%E7%AC%AC31%E5%B1%8A%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%94%B5%E8%A7%86%E5%89%A7%E9%A3%9E%E5%A4%A9%E5%A5%96/22143586" data-lemmaid="22143586">第31届中国电视剧飞天奖</a>提名名单<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="7" data-ctrmap=":7,">
[7]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_7_17626482" id="ref_7_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
；同年4月，该剧入围2017中国电视剧行业新标杆品牌奖<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="8" data-ctrmap=":8,">
[8]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_8_17626482" id="ref_8_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
。</div>
</div>
</dd>
<dd class="middleContent">
<div class="configModuleBanner">
</div><div class="lemmaWgt-promotion-leadPVBtn">
</div></dd>
<dd class="featureBaseInfo">
<div class="f_baseInfo_wrap layout">
<div class="baseBox notDouble hasVideoAndFocus mr-30">
<div class="dl-baseinfo">
<dl class="">
<dt>导演</dt>
<dd class='collapseDD' title="李路">
<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E8%B7%AF/4847406" data-lemmaid="4847406">李路</a>
</dd>
<div class="expandContainer">
<dl class="expandWrapper">
<dt>导演</dt>
<dd title="李路">
<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E8%B7%AF/4847406" data-lemmaid="4847406">李路</a>
</dd>
</dl>
<a class="toggle toCollapse">

</a>
</div>
</dl>

</dd>

<h2 class="headline-1 custom-title ">
<span class="headline-content">基本信息</span>
</h2><div class="basic-info J-basic-info cmn-clearfix">
<dl class="basicInfo-block basicInfo-left">
<dt class="basicInfo-item name" id="basic-name">中文名</dt>
<dd class="basicInfo-item value">
人民的名义
</dd>
<dt class="basicInfo-item name" id="basic-name">外文名</dt>
<dd class="basicInfo-item value">
In the name of people
</dd>
<dt class="basicInfo-item name" id="basic-name">作品类型</dt>
<dd class="basicInfo-item value">
当代、反腐、检察
</dd>
<dt class="basicInfo-item name" id="basic-name">主&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;演</dt>
<dd class="basicInfo-item value">
<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%99%86%E6%AF%85/361763" data-lemmaid="361763">陆毅</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E4%B8%B0%E6%AF%85/2139258" data-lemmaid="2139258">张丰毅</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%90%B4%E5%88%9A/2234630" data-lemmaid="2234630">吴刚</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%AE%B8%E4%BA%9A%E5%86%9B/11048686" data-lemmaid="11048686">许亚军</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E5%BF%97%E5%9D%9A/3918860" data-lemmaid="3918860">张志坚</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9F%AF%E8%93%9D/17954" data-lemmaid="17954">柯蓝</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%83%A1%E9%9D%99/11413" data-lemmaid="11413">胡静</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E5%87%AF%E4%B8%BD/2273054" data-lemmaid="2273054">张凯丽</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E8%B5%B5%E5%AD%90%E7%90%AA/3020073" data-lemmaid="3020073">赵子琪</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E7%99%BD%E5%BF%97%E8%BF%AA/397692" data-lemmaid="397692">白志迪</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E5%BB%BA%E4%B9%89/64998" data-lemmaid="64998">李建义</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%AB%98%E4%BA%9A%E9%BA%9F/7974326" data-lemmaid="7974326">高亚麟</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%B8%81%E6%B5%B7%E5%B3%B0/60634" data-lemmaid="60634">丁海峰</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%86%AF%E9%9B%B7/2616837" data-lemmaid="2616837">冯雷</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E6%9D%8E%E5%85%89%E5%A4%8D/1723339" data-lemmaid="1723339">李光复</a>、<a target=_blank href="/item/%E5%BC%A0%E6%99%9E%E4%B8%B4/10573907" data-lemmaid="10573907">张晞临</a>、李学政

<div class="anchor-list  MARK_MODULE">
<a name="1" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a>
<a name="sub17626482_1" class="lemma-anchor " ></a>
<a name="剧情简介" class="lemma-anchor " ></a>
</div><div class="para-title level-2  J-chapter " data-index="1" data-uuid="go13k8jlxq" label-module="para-title">
<h2 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">人民的名义</span>剧情简介</h2>
<a class="edit-icon j-edit-link" data-edit-dl="1" href="javascript:;"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_edit-lemma"></em>编辑</a>
<a class="audio-play part-audio-play J-part-audio-play" href="javascript:;"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_voice-play"></em>
<span class="J-part-audio-text">播报</span>
</a>
</div>
<div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13l8t5uv" >一位国家部委的项目处长被人举报受贿千万，当最高人民检察院反贪总局侦查处处长<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%BE%AF%E4%BA%AE%E5%B9%B3/20493743" data-lemmaid="20493743">侯亮平</a>前来搜查时，看到的却是一位长相憨厚、衣着朴素的“老农民”在简陋破败的旧房里吃炸酱面。</div><div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13l8t5wi" >当这位腐败分子的面具被最终撕开的同时，与该案件牵连甚紧的汉东省<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%BA%AC%E5%B7%9E%E5%B8%82/20727756" data-lemmaid="20727756">京州市</a><i>（虚拟地名）</i>副市长<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%B8%81%E4%B9%89%E7%8F%8D/20592135" data-lemmaid="20592135">丁义珍</a>，却在一位神秘人物的暗中相助下，以反侦察手段逃脱法网，流亡海外。案件线索终定位于由京州光明峰项目引发的一家汉东省国企大风服装厂的股权争夺，牵连其中的各派政治势力却盘根错节，扑朔迷离。</div><div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13pk9npc" >汉东省检察院反贪局长<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%99%88%E6%B5%B7/20592104" data-lemmaid="20592104">陈海</a>在调查行动中遭遇离奇的车祸。为了完成当年同窗的未竟事业，精明干练的<a target=_blank href="/item/%E4%BE%AF%E4%BA%AE%E5%B9%B3/20493743" data-lemmaid="20493743">侯亮平</a>临危受命，接任陈海未竟的事业。</div><div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13k8jlzh" >在汉东省政坛，以汉东省省委副书记、政法委书记<a target=_blank href="/item/%E9%AB%98%E8%82%B2%E8%89%AF/20593246" data-lemmaid="20593246">高育良</a>为代表的“政法系”，以汉东省省委常委、京州市委书记李达康为代表的“秘书帮”相争多年，不分轩轾。新任省委书记沙瑞金的到来，注定将打破这种政治的平衡局面，为汉东省的改革大业带来新的气息。<sup class="sup--normal" data-sup="9" data-ctrmap=":9,">
[9]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_9_17626482" id="ref_9_17626482">&nbsp;</a>
</div><div class="para MARK_MODULE" label-module="para" data-uuid="go13u2uawa" ><div class="lemma-picture J-lemma-picture text-pic layout-center" 
	 
		style="width:640px; float: none; display: block; margin: 0px auto; clear: both;"
	>
<a class="image-link" nslog-type="9317" 
			href="/pic/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8D%E4%B9%89/17545218/0/b3fb43166d224f4a5a44f11401f790529922d1dc?fr=lemma&fromModule=lemma_content-image&ct=single" target="_blank"
			title="人民的名义海报" 
	 
		style="width:640px;height:347.62105263158px;"
		>
<img  class="lazy-img" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAMAAAAoyzS7AAAAGXRFWHRTb2Z0d2FyZQBBZG9iZSBJbWFnZVJlYWR5ccllPAAAAAZQTFRF9fX1AAAA0VQI3QAAAAxJREFUeNpiYAAIMAAAAgABT21Z4QAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==" data-src="https://bkimg.cdn.bcebos.com/pic/b3fb43166d224f4a5a44f11401f790529922d1dc?x-bce-process=image/resize,m_lfit,w_1280,limit_1/format,f_auto"  alt="人民的名义海报"
							style="width:640px;height:347.62105263158px;"
					/>
</a>
<span class="description">
人民的名义海报
</span>
</div></div><div class="anchor-list  MARK_MODULE">
<a name="2" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a>
<a name="sub17626482_2" class="lemma-anchor " ></a>
<a name="分集剧情" class="lemma-anchor " ></a>
</div><div class="para-title level-2  J-chapter " data-index="2" data-uuid="" label-module="para-title">
<h2 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">人民的名义</span>分集剧情</h2>
<a class="edit-icon j-edit-link" data-edit-dl="2" href="javascript:;"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_edit-lemma"></em>编辑</a>
<a class="audio-play part-audio-play J-part-audio-play" href="javascript:;"><em class="cmn-icon wiki-lemma-icons wiki-lemma-icons_voice-play"></em>
<span class="J-part-audio-text">播报</span>
</a>
</div>
<div class="dramaSeries" id="dramaSeries" audio-id="2386311924" audio-count=52>
<div class="pageBar">
<a href="javascript:;" class="more">展开</a>
